WorkItem.Description: I'm sure I'm doing something wrong, but a search of the forums didn't turn anything up.  When I optimize my hunter, it has me swapping out the Iceblade arrows for Saronite arrows.  I tried updating my cache for that item, but no dice.  If I look in the regular screen, it shows the Iceblade correctly as the best choice.  Is there a setting I'm missing?  I've attached my file.  If I put this in the incorrrect forum, I apologize in advance!

Comments.Message: Don't mark the other one as available to the optimizer?

Also, you have no Buffs (though your Pet does have it's Buffs).

I've run an optimize with your character and I do see the issue, however that doesn't make any sense to me. The only thing I can think of that might be the cause is the Projectile slot not being properly checked like other slots are for comparisons. Someone with more info on that subject would need to comment.

I hadn't fixed up his buffs yet, but that's done now.

I did mark it as not available to the optimizer and that seemed to remove it.
Thanks, Jothay!  Hopefully it was an easy fix.  Those are the best kind!
